remarket.translation[0].definitions[0].d: to sell new or used goods made by other companies
remarket.translation[0].definitions[0].e: The company recycles and remarkets computer products.
remarket.translation[0].definitions[1].d: to sell bonds, shares etc ISSUED (=sold and made available) by borrowers
remarket.translation[0].definitions[1].e: The dealer with the highest bid then begins to remarket the securities to investors.
